title: Two Volumes of solids of revolution part - a

content.description: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the hyperbola x2 − y2 = 9 , the x-axis, and the line x = 5 .
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving R about the x-axis.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated by revolving R about the x-axis.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
